contents.text:
Network Working Group                                      M. Nottingham
Request for Comments: 4229                                      J. Mogul
Category: Informational                                          HP Labs
                                                           December 2005
This memo provides information for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录为互联网社区提供信息。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。本备忘录的分发不受限制。
版权所有（C）互联网协会（2005年）。

contents.text: This document defines the initial contents of a permanent IANA registry for HTTP header fields and a provisional repository for HTTP header fields, per RFC 3864.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档根据RFC 3864定义了HTTP头字段的永久IANA注册表和HTTP头字段的临时存储库的初始内容。

contents.text: HTTP/1.0 [3] and HTTP/1.1 [11] define protocol constructs (respectively, the HTTP-header and message-header BNF rules) that are used as message headers. These specifications also define a number of HTTP headers themselves, and they provide for extension through the use of new field-names.
contents.zh-CHS: HTTP/1.0[3]和HTTP/1.1[11]定义了用作消息头的协议构造（分别是HTTP头和消息头BNF规则）。这些规范本身还定义了许多HTTP头，并通过使用新字段名提供扩展。

contents.text: This document defines the initial contents of an IANA registry that catalogs permanent HTTP header field-names, and of an IANA repository that catalogs provisional HTTP header field-names. Both are operated according to Registration Procedures for Message Header Fields [1].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义了对永久HTTP头字段名称进行编目的IANA注册表和对临时HTTP头字段名称进行编目的IANA存储库的初始内容。这两个字段都是根据消息头字段的注册程序操作的[1]。

contents.text: Note that neither tracks the syntax or semantics of field-values. Also, while some HTTP headers have different semantics depending on their context (e.g., Cache-Control in requests and responses), both registries consider the HTTP header field-name name space singular.
contents.zh-CHS: 请注意，两者都不跟踪字段值的语法或语义。此外，虽然一些HTTP报头根据其上下文具有不同的语义（例如，请求和响应中的缓存控制），但两个注册中心都考虑HTTP头字段名称空间奇异。

contents.text: Also, some contact details listed may no longer be correct.
contents.zh-CHS: 此外，列出的某些联系方式可能不再正确。

contents.text: Header field entries are summarized in tabular form for convenience of reference and presented in full in the following sections.
contents.zh-CHS: 标题字段条目以表格形式汇总，以便于参考，并在以下章节中完整呈现。

contents.text:

-----------             --------

Accept-Additions          http
Accept-Charset            http

Accept-Language           http

Allow                     http
Alternates                http
Authentication-Info       http
Authorization             http
C-Ext                     http
C-Man                     http
C-Opt                     http
C-PEP                     http
C-PEP-Info                http
Cache-Control             http
Connection                http
Content-Base              http
Content-Disposition       http
Content-Encoding          http
Content-ID                http
Content-Language          http
Content-Length            http
Content-Location          http
Content-MD5               http
Content-Range             http
Content-Script-Type       http
Content-Style-Type        http
Content-Type              http
Content-Version           http
Cookie                    http
Cookie2                   http
DAV                       http
Date                      http
Default-Style             http
Delta-Base                http
Depth                     http
Derived-From              http
Destination               http
Differential-ID           http
Digest                    http

contents.zh-CHS: 作者/变更控制员：拉里·马森特(LMM@acm.org)Adobe Systems Lou Montulli(montulli@netscape.com)网景通讯公司安德鲁H穆茨(mutz@hpl.hp.com)惠普公司

contents.text: Author/change controller: Tim Berners-Lee (timbl@w3.org) MIT Laboratory for Computer Science
contents.zh-CHS: 作者/变更负责人：Tim Berners Lee(timbl@w3.org)麻省理工学院计算机科学实验室

contents.text: This specification provides initial registrations of HTTP header fields in the "Permanent Message Header Field Registry", defined by Registration Procedures for Message Header Fields [1].
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范提供了“永久消息头字段注册表”中HTTP头字段的初始注册，该注册表由消息头字段的注册过程定义[1]。

contents.text: It also provides initial submissions of HTTP header fields in the "Provisional Message Header Field Repository", defined by the same document.
contents.zh-CHS: 它还提供了由同一文档定义的“临时消息头字段存储库”中HTTP头字段的初始提交。

contents.text: No security considerations are introduced by this document beyond those already inherent in use of the HTTP header fields referenced.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了在使用所引用的HTTP头字段时已经固有的安全注意事项外，本文档没有引入其他安全注意事项。

contents.text: The authors would like to thank Graham Klyne for his work in defining the message header registries, his input and help in preparing this document, and the registry generation software.
contents.zh-CHS: 作者要感谢Graham Klyne在定义消息头注册表方面所做的工作、在编写本文档时的投入和帮助，以及注册表生成软件。

contents.text: The IETF invites any interested party to bring to its attention any copyrights, patents or patent applications, or other proprietary rights that may cover technology that may be required to implement this standard. Please address the information to the IETF at ietf-ipr@ietf.org.
